snippet: A study found that more patients needed surgery to fix or replace metal hips compared with artificial joints made from ceramic or plastic.
abstract: British experts advise doctors to stop using metal-on-metal hip replacements, citing analysis that shows they have to be fixed or replaced more often than other implants made from ceramic or plastic.
lead_paragraph: A study found that more patients needed surgery to fix or replace metal hips compared with artificial joints made from ceramic or plastic.

headline.seo: British Experts Want Doctors to Stop Using Metal-on-Metal Hips
